channel.title: NYS:TDG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:TDG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: TransDigm Launches Debt For $4.3 Billion Shareholder Payout
item.description: Airplane-parts maker TransDigm Group Inc. launched a $4 billion debt offering on Monday to fund a roughly $4.3 billion special cash dividend to shareholders, according to a regulatory filing.

item.title: TransDigm Launches Debt For $4.3 Billion Shareholder Payout
